name: Brulitha_Horne
text:
Brulitha Horne
Brulitha Horne was the wife of Orville Horne, founder of Horne's General Store.
Biography
In 1905, following the arrival of Brulitha and Orville in Twin Peaks, Orville opened Horne's General Store, which flourished after Thor's Trading Post burned down.
Brulitha would eventually become known as an athlete and a poet, who published an epic poem about Twin Peaks, titled, O Twin Peaks, My Land, My Home.
